title: Set up Supabase with tables for users, pois, and tours
body:
As a developer, I want to set up Supabase with tables for `users`, `pois`, and `tours` so that we can store location content.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Supabase tables created
- Foreign keys and indexes set
- Supabase project environment initialized

title: Configure FastAPI backend with Supabase JWT auth
body:
As a developer, I want to configure a FastAPI backend project with auth middleware using Supabase JWT.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Middleware to validate JWT tokens
- Authenticated routes for users
- Dev environment secrets and local testing confirmed

title: Deploy FastAPI backend to Railway
body:
As a developer, I want to deploy the FastAPI backend to Railway with HTTPS enabled.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Live backend endpoint available
- HTTPS enabled
- Basic health route returns 200

title: Implement POI CRUD endpoints in FastAPI
body:
As an admin, I want to create, update, and delete POIs via FastAPI endpoints.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- POST/PUT/DELETE routes for POIs
- Validation for coordinates and URLs
- Full test coverage

title: Implement location-based POI retrieval
body:
As a user, I want to fetch a list of POIs near my GPS coordinates.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Query returns POIs within 20m radius
- Includes metadata and playback URL

title: Test geofence logic with mock GPS data
body:
As a developer, I want to test geofence matching within a 20-meter radius.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Unit tests simulate GPS drift
- Edge cases handled for radius tolerance

title: Enable autoplay audio on POI proximity
body:
As a user, I want audio narration to autoplay when I enter a POI's geofence.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Audio autoplays from S3 URL
- Works reliably on mobile devices

title: Support fallback to browser TTS if no audio
body:
As a developer, I want to support fallback to browser TTS if no audio file is found.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- POI falls back to TTS with formatted text
- Works on Chrome, Safari

title: Upload narration MP3 files to AWS S3
body:
As an admin, I want to upload MP3 narration files to AWS S3 via the dashboard.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- S3 upload via presigned URLs
- File validated and URL stored in Supabase

title: Render user and POIs on interactive map
body:
As a user, I want to see my real-time location and nearby POIs on a map.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Map renders location pin and POIs
- Auto zooms and refreshes position

title: Use Mapbox/Leaflet for map rendering
body:
As a developer, I want to use Mapbox or Leaflet to render an interactive map with POI markers.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- POI markers clickable
- Map loads efficiently

title: Enable pause, skip, replay of audio
body:
As a user, I want to pause, skip, or replay narration from the UI.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Player UI controls available
- Playback state managed cleanly

title: Create and join group tour sessions
body:
As a user, I want to create a group session and invite others with a session code.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Session created with unique ID
- Supabase sync participants

title: Sync current POI across group
body:
As a participant, I want my device to stay in sync with the leaderâ€™s current POI.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Realtime updates via Supabase
- Minimal delay and replay-safe

title: Broadcast POI changes with Supabase Realtime
body:
As a developer, I want to implement Supabase Realtime to broadcast POI changes.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Events pushed to all group participants
- Logs show successful dispatch

title: Create trivia questions per POI
body:
As an admin, I want to create trivia questions linked to POIs.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Form for question, answers, correct index
- Linked to `poi_id`

title: Answer quiz questions and see results
body:
As a user, I want to answer quiz questions and see correct answers immediately.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Frontend quiz flow working
- Feedback and score stored

title: Persist quiz scores per user
body:
As a developer, I want to persist quiz scores and progress per user.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Progress saved in Supabase
- Admin view of user completion

title: Admin dashboard for POI and audio upload
body:
As an admin, I want a dashboard to view/edit POIs and upload content.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Auth-protected dashboard
- File and text inputs validated

title: Analytics: View POI visits and tour completions
body:
As an admin, I want to see analytics like POI visits and tour completions.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Supabase queries for engagement
- Charts or summary stats rendered

title: Deploy frontend to Vercel with environment setup
body:
As a developer, I want to deploy the frontend to Vercel with proper environment variables.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Live domain
- Vercel build pipeline works

title: End-to-end test of group tour flow
body:
As a QA, I want to test the full tour experience with 3 users in a group.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Session join, POI sync, audio trigger tested
- Devices tested: mobile + tablet

title: Soft launch beta with 10 users and collect feedback
body:
As a team, I want to soft launch a beta with 10 real users and collect feedback.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Feedback form or chat group created
- Bugs/insights documented
